summary: Get the list of reject reason
description: Get the list of reject reason. Need to be used in all refuse refund actions

query.name: reverse_order_line_id
query.description: reverse order line,Can be understood as reverse order item id

common.name: app_key
common.description: Unique app ID issued by LAZADA Open Platform console when you apply for an app category

common.name: timestamp
common.description: The time stamp of the request e.g. 1517820392000 (which translates to 5 February 2018 08:46:32) with less than 7200s difference from UTC time

common.name: sign_method
common.description: The HMAC hash algorithm you are using to calculate your signature

request_examples.code:
client = LazopApiClient::Client.new(url, appkey, appSecret)
request = LazopApiClient::Request.new('/order/reverse/reason/list','GET')
request.add_api_parameter("reverse_order_line_id", "0")
response = client.execute(request, accessToken)
puts response.success?
puts response.body

client = lazop.LazopClient(url, appkey ,appSecret)
request = lazop.LazopRequest('/order/reverse/reason/list','GET')
request.add_api_param('reverse_order_line_id', '0')
response = client.execute(request, access_token)
print(response.type)
print(response.body)

error_codes.message: E0103: reverse order line id is empty when query reject reason
error_codes.description: E0103: reverse order line id is empty when query reject reason

error_codes.message: E0119: cannot find any cancel reasons for these orders
error_codes.description: E0119: cannot find any cancel reasons for these orders
